<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a file descriptor being monitored by ::poll is closed by another thread,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the result is unspecified. In the case ::poll does not unblock and return,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when ActiveFD is closed, you can provide another file descriptor via CancelFD</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that when written to will cause poll to return. Typically CancelFD is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// read end of a unidirectional pipe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Timeout should be -1 to block indefinitly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getActiveFD is a callback to handle ActiveFD&#39;s of std::atomic&lt;int&gt; and int</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="#ab48a833c4f2a5ebcee2b8abada3e0ac5"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#ab48a833c4f2a5ebcee2b8abada3e0ac5">manageTimeout</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::chrono::milliseconds &amp;Timeout,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t FDCount = 1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FD&#91;1&#93;.fd = CancelFD.value();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FDCount++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of how much time has passed in case ::poll or WSAPoll are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interupted by a signal and need to be recalled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Start = std::chrono::steady&#95;clock::now();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemainingTimeout = Timeout;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PollStatus = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Timeout is -1 then poll should block and RemainingTimeout does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to be recalculated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PollStatus != 0 &amp;&amp; Timeout != std::chrono::milliseconds(-1)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">              std::chrono::steady&#95;clock::now() - Start);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TotalElapsedTime &gt;= Timeout)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RemainingTimeout = Timeout - TotalElapsedTime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PollStatus == -1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If ActiveFD equals -1 or CancelFD has data to be read then the operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has been canceled by another thread</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (getActiveFD() == -1 || (CancelFD.has&#95;value() &amp;&amp; FD&#91;1&#93;.revents &amp; POLLIN))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if &#95;WIN32</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FD&#91;0&#93;.revents &amp; POLLNVAL)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;error&#95;code(std::errc::bad&#95;file&#95;descriptor);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code();</span></CodeLine>
